entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the Potions master who has a sinister tone and seems to be beyond reason. He mentions calling dementors and dragging Lupin.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is mentioned as someone that dementors are pleased to see, implying he has some connection with them.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are supernatural creatures that Snape mentions will be pleased to see Black and might give him a kiss.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a werewolf who Snape wants to drag in front of the dementors.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is Harry Potter, who blocks the door and is scolded by Snape for being in trouble already.

relationships.description: Snape mentions that dementors are pleased to see Black, implying a connection between them.
Snape wants to drag Lupin in front of the dementors.
